Reviews.Title: The worst purchese of BB 8900
Reviews.Author: Carlos E. Level
Reviews.Content: This have being my worst purchese I have made. It came in bad condition and no Unloked as the seller said...So you have "0". Amazon, do not let that seller sell in this excelent Internet store.

Reviews.Title: Phone that does not work
Reviews.Author: KadyB
Reviews.Content: This seller sold me a Blackberry Curve 8900 that has only worked for less than a month. I advise you not to go with this seller.

Reviews.Title: Excelente!!!
Reviews.Author: Reynel Leal
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased and satisfied with the product for me is excellent, no I do not like nad, meets all my expectations ...

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Blackberry 8900
Reviews.Author: Terry L. Bruce
Reviews.Content: After receiving the unlocked Blackberry I discovered that the Blackberry Messenger Services are not included. And AT&T; was no help in getting then installed, they say I would have to buy one of their locked Blackberry to get the services included. The seller, J&R;, did give me the phone number of RIM but they are on vacation for some days. J&R; sugguested that I download the services, but didn't give me specify direccions on specifically how to do this. I am a bit afraid of downloads as that is what put my previous Blackberry out of comission. I bought the Blackberry specially because of the Blackberry Messenger Services, how I don't have any and am having to use SMS.I bought an unlock one this time because I would like to use another service provider's SIM with the phone too. Of course with all the Blackberry Services.With the services it is a great cellular and I was very happy with my previous one until it crashed while updating it.

Reviews.Title: TODO DENTRO DE LO NORMAL
Reviews.Author: JUAN R. GUZMAN
Reviews.Content: EL EQUIPO LLEGO RAPIDO PERO NO TRAJO NINGUN ACCESORIO SOLO EL CARGADOR Y DE OTRA MARCA POR LO DEMAS TODO ESTUVO DENTRO DE LO NORMAL

Reviews.Title: Happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: moises
Reviews.Content: This phone is good, so far it has been working fine. it's a little slow but for the price it's acceptable.

Reviews.Title: BlackBerry Curve 8900
Reviews.Author: Gina R. Grijalva
Reviews.Content: I ordered and paid for a brand new Black Berry Curve 8900 and what was shipped to me is a used refurbished phone that does not work very well. dont know what to do with it.

Reviews.Title: No Guaranty
Reviews.Author: Yessica Chevez
Reviews.Content: I like the phone but I am not very happy that it doesn't have guaranty at least a 90, 60 or 30 days.

Reviews.Title: buen equipo.
Reviews.Author: alejandro
Reviews.Content: muy buen equipo a pesar de ser usado.. funciona corectamente y lo recomiendo totalemte , , , , , ,

Reviews.Title: STOLEN mobile phone
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Ruiz
Reviews.Content: BlackBerry Curve 8900 Javelin Unlocked Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, GPS Navigation, Stereo Bluetooth, and MicroSD Slot - Unlocked Phone - No Warranty - BlackI bought this computer and this is blocked by that was stolen and given that he was in that situation so sent, that is a lack of seriousness that sell those items that are useless and now I want to anneal the lack need my money because I have been scammed.He comprado este equipo y resulta que esta bloqueado por que fue robado y teniendo en cuenta que se encontraba en esa situacion asi lo enviaron, esa es una falta de seriedad que vendan esos articulos que no sirven para nada y ahora no quieren recocer la falta necesito mi dinero porque he sido estafado.

Reviews.Title: PÉSIMA VENTA
Reviews.Author: william GVD "WGVD"
Reviews.Content: MUY MALA VENTA POR LA PARTE VENDEDORA ESTE PRODUCTO LLEGO A LAS OFICINAS DE ENVIÓ SIN FACTURAS ESTA ESTA MU MAL PORQUE VOY A TENER FULL PROBLEMAS HE INCONVENIENTES PARA RECIBIR ESTE PRODUCTO....

Reviews.Title: Buen producto
Reviews.Author: Victor Alvarez
Reviews.Content: El teléfono llego a mis manos en perfecto estado, junto con todos sus accesorios nuevos tal y como lo ofrecen en la publicación, esta es una empresa responsable gracias!!

Reviews.Title: excelente.
Reviews.Author: glanexys
Reviews.Content: excelente articulo, recomendado, original, de mu buena calidad y vendedor muy serio y responsable, la entrega se recibió en la fecha acordada..

ProductInfo.Features:
2.4-inch TFT LCD display
Access all your email and messaging with the sleekest, lightest, thinnest full-QWERTY keyboard BlackBerry yet featuring a high-resolution 480 x 320 pixel
Wi-Fi connectivity for Web browsing; GPS for turn-by-turn directions using BlackBerry Maps; 3.2-megapixel digital camera; Bluetooth stereo music; MicroSD expansion to 16 GB
Up to 5.5 hours of talk time, up to 356 hours (15 days) of standby time
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint. Quad-band cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities
ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry Curve 8900 Javelin Unlocked Phone with 3.2 MP Camera, GPS Navigation, Stereo Bluetooth, and MicroSD Slot - Unlocked Phone - No Warranty - Black
